title: The Academy: Making of a Ruler (The Eagle King's Academy Book 1)
features: “I want you to remember something, Mr Hallman. At The Academy, you’re always evaluated. Even when you least expect it.”
Axel is an imposter. A liar.
He has no interest in ruling the world and yet he’s about to enter The Eagle King’s Academy.

In a world that is obsessed with leadership, The Academy is legendary. It only admits twelve students every three years, but once they graduate, these unknown students will become the most powerful and influential leaders of their time. They will rule the world.
Now, against his will, Axel is taken to a secret location to begin his training. But nothing is as it seems.

Behind the luxurious and polished façade awaits a world full of lies, ambitions and dark secrets. Before long, Axel finds himself trapped in a very sinister game of power. A game far worse than anyone could’ve imagined.
The Academy is the first book in the Eagle King’s Academy Series. An extraordinary and original story of power, deception, and betrayal.
Immerse yourself into a grand story of power and betrayal.
Perfect for fans of thrilling suspense, dark conspiracies, and extravagant settings.

Leadership has long been seen as one of the most vital and influential factors in both social and organisational development. It is believed to play a central part in how humans interact and collaborate. But where do these beliefs come from and how do they affect us?

These are a few questions that have occupied C.C. Monö’s mind since 2007. After spending several years exploring the leadership industry and its effect on people and societies, C.C. Monö first had the idea for the Eagle King’s Academy series while giving a guest lecture on followership at Linköping University.

After that, the idea slowly grew in his mind for nine months. Then, in July 2014, while on holiday in Borneo, he presented a simple outline of The Academy to his wife, Cindy. To his surprise, she loved it and so he began sketching on his synopsis.
Don’t miss the second book in the series - The Box: Puppets & Puppeteers.
